fields.name: Galas
fields.description: Glamorous red carpet screenings of hot feature film premieres

fields.name: Up and Coming
fields.description: New director wonders from around the globe. A section reaching across genres and borders to bring you the best new indie films

fields.name: Focus Country
fields.description: Strand showcasing the best films from this edition's country of focus

fields.name: Family Time
fields.description: Fun-packed films for the little and big ones. Rediscover the wonder of classical animations and be amazed by our selection of new features

fields.name: Late Night Thrills
fields.description: Be prepared to be scared! Late night thrillers and horrors for the fearless thrill-seekers

fields.name: Immersive Pop Ups
fields.description: Celebrate new and classic films by immersing yourself in them fully with themed screenings. Movie-inspired cocktails and snacks, curated playlist and a fun after party!
